backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, courses, lessons, trainee progress, and admin-restricted content management with AccessControl and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report linking product features to corresponding source files, components, and test IDs for project traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten mapping of frontend file paths to short summaries describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React application and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining public and admin routes, layout, and theming for the application.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Component that checks admin status and blocks access with an error screen when the caller lacks privileges.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth button handling Internet Identity login/logout with state feedback and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal forcing first-time users to submit name and optional email before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, authentication state, and footer wrapper.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations including admin checks and PDF import functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContent.ts: Provides admin CRUD hooks for courses, lessons, and content status with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCourses.ts: Exposes public course and lesson retrieval hooks using the actor for fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useKnowledgeBase.ts: Fetches all lessons or a single lesson for the knowledge base by aggregating lessons across courses.
frontend/src/hooks/useProgress.ts: Handles trainee progress fetching and mutations for completing lessons or enrolling in courses.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile with proper loading state handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining theme colors and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with information about AAA Lawyers’ training focus, mission, and course topics using cards and structured sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCoursesPag: Implements the admin interface for creating, editing, and managing courses, including dialogs, forms, and status updates.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows the admin dashboard with navigation cards for PDF import, course management, and lesson management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLessonsPag: Provides an admin interface for creating, editing, and managing lessons with form dialogs and status controls.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPdfIngestP: Provides an admin interface to upload a PDF, trigger import via mutation, and optionally paste extracted text.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details and training support info with cards for phone, email, location, and office hours.
frontend/src/pages/courses/CourseDetailP: Displays course details, enrollment actions, and user progress with published lessons.
frontend/src/pages/courses/CoursesIndexP: Lists all published courses with loading states and navigation to individual course pages.
frontend/src/pages/courses/LessonPage.ts: Shows a lesson's content, completion tracking, and navigation to adjacent published lessons.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage layout with hero section, training overview, and feature cards linking to courses and the knowledge base.
frontend/src/pages/knowledge-base/Articl: Displays a knowledge‑base article’s title and content with loading and not‑found handling.
frontend/src/pages/knowledge-base/Knowle: Lists published knowledge‑base articles with category filters and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state including scope, features, requirements, and image needs for the AAA Lawyers training site.
